entry.p: Many years ago I took a class in drawing. At the time I was working as a writer/editor in New York City; I found the contrast of learning to draw both tiring and exhilarating. I can't say that the results were stellar, but I do have the following drawing on the wall in my house (I don't really believe in titles for works for visual art, but for me this drawing evokes the word "Aubade"):
